column4: Hi everyone, hopefully someone can help me out with this problem I have... everytime I reboot my USB devices get remounted to /media/volume_ then everytime there is a new __ so I get tons of them wit _____ at the end, how can I prevent this?
what filesystem are they?  tune2fs for ext2/3 - i boot to windows to label vfat/ntfs
they were formated in Windows and I am pretty sure they have labels
by default under windows they give the disks a blank label from what ive seen.
